compounddef.title: RANDNCHI Generate Noncentral Chi-Square Random Variable

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Generates a vector of non-central chi-square random variables with the given number of degrees of freedom and the given non-centrality parameters. The general syntax for its use is y = randnchi(n,mu) where n is an array containing the degrees of freedom for each generated random variable (with each element of n >= 1), and mu is the non-centrality shift (must be positive).

sect1.title: Internals
sect1.para: A non-central chi-square random variable is the sum of a chisquare deviate with n-1 degrees of freedom plus the square of a normal deviate with mean mu and standard deviation 1.

sect1.title: Examples
